title: Eschalon book III
description:
unrar the file, then:

1. Install (pay attention to where the game is installing in ur files)
2. Now copy the file in crack folder and paste/put it in place where u installed the game.
Usually the place is - C:Program Files (x86)Eschalon Book III

3. Now play the game and if u like it, support the developers and purchase it!

I will try to seed it long, bet please be a good pirates and give others the chance to download as well.
